name: BACTERIA, THE FUTURE
description:
This was created to look at the public health threat of antibiotic resistance in a different light, inspired by my favorite sci-fi shows (ones I've been binge watching during quarantine), Star Trek, Red Dwarf, Rick and Morty, and some of the writing by Lovecraft. 

If it's possible to take a pre-game and post-game survey, I would be so thankful for any feedback to make next versions more fun/a better educational tool!

1. Pre-game survey: https://forms.gle/Y58gWeWRWRvTF6qK7

2. Game: https://nniethamer.itch.io/bacteria-the-future

3. Post-game survey: https://forms.gle/a96hcLZrv9vvwByD7

Thank you for playing, and hope you enjoy this time- travelling Twine game to save Hugh-manity!
